lead_paragraph: Behind the scenes, AbTech Industries had been working to try to persuade the county, in Senator Skelos’s political backyard, to embark upon a more than $10 million storm-water project.

headline.print_headline: Company’s Quest for Long Island Contract Was Aided by Familiar Name
headline.main: With Dean Skelos’s Son Aboard, AbTech Seemed Confident in Bid for Nassau County Contract

snippet: Behind the scenes, AbTech Industries had been working to try to persuade the county, in Senator Skelos’s political backyard, to embark upon a more than $10 million storm-water project.
abstract: Ability of engineering firm AbTech Industries to secure government contract with Nassau County on Long Island appears to have been smoothed by company's consulting relationship with Adam Skelos, son of New York State Sen Dean Skelos, who represents district; while charges of wrongdoing have yet to be filed, federal prosecutors are scrutinizing deal and whether improper influence by Sen Skelos played any role.
